item.title: Figma for Visual Language Learning
item.description: What it is A collaborative design tool perfect for creating visual language learning materials, mind maps, and spatial organization of concepts. How to use it for language learning Build vocabulary mind maps, label diagrams, create visual stories, and organize language concepts spatially for better retention.
